EMAIL.REQUIRED: Please enter a valid email address.

TEXT.NO_INITIAL_SPACE: It cannot start with a space.
TEXT.NO_TRAILING_SPACE: It cannot end with a space.
TEXT.USERNAME: It can only have letters and numbers.
TEXT.MAX_WORDS_BETWEEN: It must have between {{MIN}} and {{MAX}} words.

PASSWORD.EIGHT_LONG: It must be at least 8 characters long.
PASSWORD.ONE_NUMBER: It must contain at least one number.
PASSWORD.ONE_SPECIAL: It must contain at least one special character.
PASSWORD.ONE_UPPERCASE: It must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD.ONE_LOWERCASE: It must contain at least one lowercase letter.

NUMBER.MIN: This field must be greater than {{MIN}}.
NUMBER.MAX: This field must be less than {{MAX}}.

LOGIN.CREATE_SUBTITLE: It's free and always will be.
LOGIN.DATA_POLICY: By clicking Sign Up, you agree to our Terms, Data Policy and Cookies Policy.

TOOLTIP.SUBTITLE: Hover the input to see the icon 'i' and hover it to see the tooltip.

SKELETONS.SUBTITLE: To display a loading input, set the value of isLoading to true in the GTPageStateProvider.
